meanings.definition: The act or practice of marking the skin with indelible patterns, pictures, legends, etc., by making punctures in it and inserting pigments.
meanings.sent1: Tattooing can be a form of self-expression through art on the skin.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate tattooing on his arm.
meanings.sent3: The tattooing on her back told a story of her travels around the world.
meanings.sent4: His tattooing was like a map of memories etched into his skin.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the tattooing stood out against his pale skin.
